title: The Game of Life and How to Play It
creator: Florence Scovel Shinn
description: LibriVox recording of The Game of Life and How to Play It by Florence Scovel Shinn. Read by Amy Conger. Florence Scovel Shinn, an illustrator living in New York City, became a teacher of New Thought after a divorce. New Thought was a movement which holds the belief that individuals can create their own reality through intentional thoughts and prayer, much like the current Law of Attraction movement. The Game of Life and How to Play It is her first book, and is remarkable for being written by a woman and meant for a genteel female audience. For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org. M4B format available
subject: librivox; audiobook; self help; new thought; prosperity; karma; love; intuition; affirmations
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text

reviews.reviewbody: Thank you so much for this. Came at the right time for me. Brilliantly done.  A joy to listen to.
